reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and her passion for biology is contagious. Best professor I've had!

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Wilson explains complex concepts clearly. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's practical approach to teaching programming is excellent. Her projects are relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown knows his subject well, but lectures can be dry. More interactive sessions would help.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez creates a supportive learning environment. Her research-based teaching approach is very effective.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's enthusiasm for physics is evident. Sometimes moves too quickly, but overall a great teacher.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's analysis of literary works is insightful. She encourages critical thinking and open discussion.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's lectures are informative, but could use more real-world examples to illustrate concepts.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. White's lab sessions are well-organized and educational. Her explanations make complex reactions understandable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Green's Socratic method of teaching is incredibly effective. He challenges students to think deeply.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Wong brings sociological theories to life with current events. Her assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson is knowledgeable, but could improve on making the subject more engaging for non-majors.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's field trips and hands-on approach make learning about the environment fascinating and relevant.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Smith encourages healthy debate and provides balanced views on complex political issues.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Cohen's lectures are captivating. She explains complex brain functions in an understandable way.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien has industry experience, but his teaching style could be more dynamic and interactive.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's enthusiasm for rocks is surprisingly contagious. Her lab sessions are particularly informative.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Tanaka's global perspective and use of case studies make his classes extremely valuable and interesting.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Al-Mansour's stargazing sessions are a highlight. Her passion for the cosmos is truly inspiring.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Williams is clearly an expert, but could work on making the material more accessible to beginners.
